description:
The final battle begins, but the plan is in shambles! Koji has been lured into a trap, and without the power of Mazinger Z, the fate of Kurogane House, the Mazinger Army, and all of Atami is in peril!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Verge of Death! All-out Attack Dr. Hell
¡A vida o muerte! La ofensiva del Dr. Infierno
